channel.title: EORA - the Overview
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian

item.title: Anemone
item.description:
Infobox
Very packed (think of New Orleans or Detroit). It's battered city, but has a sense of community. Also dubbed an ‘industrial’ city, given that it’s adjacent to the manufacturing and mining sectors. Manufacturing plants have started to bleed into the city over the recent years.
This district is along the northern edge of the city. PC Information Kaimop's Family-Owned Tavern is located in this district.
This district is along the northwestern edge of the city. Currently Important Russel Tally's house is located in this district. Orval's Sweet Delights is located in this district. This district is along the southwestern edge of the city.
A Yellowbrick University branch is located in this district. This district is along the southern edge of the city. This district is along the southeastern edge of the city.
A satellite temple of the Inventor is located in this district. Currently Important TOYS & TREATS is located in this district. A sliver of this district is along the eastern edge of the city.
A Kindlelight University branch is located in this district.
The Last Line Tavern is located in this district. This district is along the northeastern edge of the city. Currently Important "The shack" is located in this district. This district boarders Firebox and Brasscroft. This district boarders Brasscroft and Steelburg. This district is located near the center of the city. The 4th Ward is located here .

item.title: Amaryllis
item.description:
Infobox
Is essentially a larger version of Hollyhock with more fantasy motifs than steampunk. Has many libraries, stores, and centers relating to magic/spellcasting. Has a stray cat problem. This district is along the northern edge of the city.
The Grand Library is located in this district. This district is along the northwestern edge of the city.
The Esemone Institute is located in this district. This district boarders the western side of Crystalview.
This district boarders Moonstone Heights. PC Information Diaspro's loft above Earmark's Emporium is located in this district. This district is along the southern edge of the city.
A Silvervalley University branch is located in this district. This district is along the eastern edge of the city.
The Tulane School of Wizardry is located in district. This district is along the northeastern edge of the city. This district is located in the center of this city.
The Garden is located in this district.

item.title: Hollyhock
item.description:
Infobox
Very congested (think of New York City, Houston, or Chicago). It's where everyone wants to be, but there's barely enough space for everyone. This district is along the northern edge of the city. This district is along the northwestern edge of the city. This district is along the western edge of the city.
Kindlelight University is located in this district. This district is along the southwestern edge of the city. This district is along the southern edge of the city.
Silvervalley University is located in this district. This district is along the southeastern edge of the city. This district is along the eastern edge of the city.
Yellowbrick University is located in this district. This district is along the northeastern edge of the city. This district is located in the center of this city.
The Pacific Estate and The Oasis are in this district.

item.title: Edelweiss
item.description:
Infobox
Think of Venice, Italy, but instead of water/boat rides it is civilian-owned personal sky vehicles everywhere. Unlike other Petals, Edelweiss’ main transportation is by airship/skyship instead of train/shuttle. Hosts of the Annual Eora Fair and has many public art pieces relating to mechanisms. This district is along the northeastern edge of the city. This district is along the northwestern edge of the city. This district is along the eastern edge of the city.
A Questworld Park is located in this district.
This district is along the southwestern edge of the city. PC Information Diaspro Lietbriet’s ancestral family estate is located in this district. This district is along the southeastern edge of the city.
A Kindlelight University branch is located in this district. This district is along the eastern edge of the city.
Zeppelin Flight Academy is located in this district.
The Sky Hub is located in this district. This district is located in the center of the city.
The Exhibit is located in this district.

item.title: SESSION 14 RECAP
item.description:
day - March 19 (Mon) Wynn, Irosys and Diaspro travel to the city of Amaryllis to visit Esemone Institute’s library on the way, the trio quickly visit Diaspro’s loft in the district of Crystalview
Esemone’s library - the Enna - houses information for its four main undergraduate degrees Irosys and Wynn get visitor passes through Diaspro before being allowed into the library once inside, Diaspro uses her graduate-student access to search an array of key terms/words in order to find useful books the books (so far): “From Before - A Collection of Short Stories” “History of the Inciting Incidents : Volume 1”

item.title: Esemone, Institute of the Arcana
item.description: Offers Bachelors of Magic degrees. Gives minors/Masters in Abjuration, Conjuration, Divination, Necromancy, and Magical Theory. (Can make more.) Has clubs of valor and lore. WIPEsemone’s library, the Enna, consists of three main sections: the entrance, the main hall, and the tower.The Entrance has a coffee shop on one wall and a visitor kiosk on the opposite wall. The back wall is an open entryway with a magical gate that restricts access to students, faculty, and those given permission.The Main Hall is all one floor and is about one-and-a-half stories all. The Hall has two open walls, one that connects to the Entrance and another to the Tower. The remaining walls are covered floor-to-ceiling with bookshelves. In the center of the Hall is an information kiosk. The rest of the floor is filled with a variety of chairs, tables, and couches. Even the bookshelves have embedded nooks at different levels with extra sitting space.Books in the Hall include general information such as history textbooks, popular memoirs and fundamental texts. For ease of access, the information kiosk houses ‘search scrolls’ that indexes all the books in the library. However depending on a student’s access, certain books are not available to read or check-out. Excluding the ceiling-high ladders, light sprites can also be used to retrieve books for students.The Tower is divided into four floors. Each floor focuses on a specific field that Esemone is known for. From bottom to top: Abjuration, Conjuration, Necromancy, and Divination. To access any higher floors, a magic user has to activate a levitation circle that’s in the center of each floor. Anyone with library access can visit any floor (minus Necromancy) but won’t be able to read high-level or degree-specific texts.
item.guid: 2. World/2.5 Education/Magical Universities/Esemone, Institute of the Arcana.md

item.title: SESSION 13.5 RECAP
item.description: day - March 19 (Mon) when Kaimop and Thia meet with Ava Tally, they hand over the list of questions that the party pooled together Ava goes through each question and answers them truthfully, but she refuses to answer any questions relating to Igyln and whatever the white thal miners are doing the duo then heads to the Half-Full Flask and talk to Hez the tavernkeeper Hez details seeing Russel on the night he got caught walking to the shack, and had showed his camera footage to some AoP when they visited to investigate afterwards, Kaimop and Thia walk over to Orvel's Sweet Delights - a candy store that Hez mentioned Russel likes the frequent

item.title: SESSION 4 RECAP
item.description:
night - March 15 (Thu) while traveling to Kaimop's family's tavern, Kaimop and Wynn are attacked by a mutated version of one of the creatures they fought at the Last Line tavern Kaimop and Wynn spend the night at his family's tavern Thia & Diaspro travel to the Exhibit in Edelweiss to talk to Diaspro's father Diaspro tells her father everything that's happened to her, and her dad reveals that her uncle was the one that warned him to stay out of Anemone while traveling to the Lietbriet ancestral estate, Thia, Diaspro and Diaspro's father are attacked by a cloaked figure Thia charms the figure, and they learn that the figure is a member of the Black Cloak Coalition (BCC), and has an objective to kill Thia Aldershine Thia & Diaspro spend the night at the estate day - March 16 (Fri) after talking to Kaimop's mother, Kaimop and Wynn head to the mining circle to talk to one of Kaimop's work friends while talking to Kaimop's work friend, they learn that she: doesn't recognize any of the symptoms that Kaimop & Wynn describe doesn't know anyone in the white thal mining group, but can do some digging doesn't recall there ever being research into white thal exposure vaguely remembers one of her coworkers, Gord, talking about Rus
Kaimop & Wynn then head back into Copper Lane to talk to Kaimop's close friend, Mariana Thia & Diaspro spend their morning reading books from the Lietbriet library they learn that: many Lietbriets joined the military during the Scorched Petals, but not many since in the past century, the Lietbriets have been switching metal components in their machinery to white thal the Argus family patented camera typically has a separate box that streams/stores the feed of the camera up to 2 miles Thia & Diaspro then start making their way back to Anemone to meet with the rest of the group at Rus' house

item.title: SESSION 13 RECAP
item.description: night - Mar 18 (Sun) after defeating the 3 thugs at the Last Line tavern, Cel tells the party (minus Irosys) to quickly get rid of the bodies due to them having identifiers that could be traced back to the tavern. Cel uncovers an interesting note from one of the thugs, and identifies all 3 of them as part of Oxide Diaspro kills the 3 Oxide members before they dispose the bodies a few blocks away Cel calls for Xavier and Belle (the pink-skinned tiefling), and has her explain what mess she got herself into. important points from that discussion: the note from the Oxide member details an exchange of units of “candlewake” (a drug) Belle was caught snooping on this exchange and was chased to the Last Line tavern Belle is part of a larger rival gang that’s snooping on Oxide on behalf of another illegal group the party (minus Irosys) all head to bed day - Mar 19 (Mon) Irosys rejoins the party, and while eating the breakfast the party discuss what to do the party decides to split up: Kai and Thia will go and revisit Ava Tally; and Wynn, Irosys and Diaspro will travel to Amaryllis to visit Esemone’s library the party come up with a list of questions for Ava that Kaimop and Thia will ask her

item.title: SESSION 12.5 RECAP
item.description: night - Mar 18 (Sun) after helping the rest of the party defeat the 3 thugs at the Last Line tavern, Irosys breaks off and travels to the Tallys’ house staking out the house, Irosys waits as a mailman delivers the letters Diaspro sent to Ava Tally earlier in the day eventually Ava leaves her house with the letters in her hand, and Irosys trails her to intercept Irosys successfully steals the letters off of Ava, but is forced to roof-hop as Ava chases after him from the street Irosys gets cornered on top of a laundromat and poses as a drunkard to avoid suspicion Ava calls over the local AoP, and they arrest Irosys for public intoxication. he is held overnight at the local precinct. Irosys travels back to the Last Line tavern the following morning

item.title: SESSION 12 RECAP
item.description: night - Mar 18 (Sun) FIGHT

item.title: SESSION 11 RECAP
item.description: day - Mar 18 (Sun) Margret Bering is able to release Diaspro from custody due to insufficient evidence of Diaspro’s crime. Diaspro rejoins the party at the Last Line tavern, Kaimop and Diaspro have an argument, ending with Diaspro heading back to her tavern-room. Irosys then talks to Kaimop, trying to empathize with him over Diaspro’s attitude eventually Kaimop, Thia, Irosys and Wynn discuss what to say to the white thal miners. they decide to have Irosys and Wynn travel to Hollyhock to visit Irosys’ mentor, someone they think could be of help, Diaspro joins the discussion and gives Kaimop a non-dangerous looking potion, Irosys and Wynn leave and the rest of the party wait for Otto to arrive, Otto and Yarla (another white thal miner) arrive and they have a talk, main points of the talk: neither Otto nor Yarla recognize the black dagger, mysterious clock, or fissures that Diaspro saw in her dreams, Kaimop tells them about the shadowy figures, Otto and Yarla hint that until the party comes up with a better solution, they will be following their “initial plan”, Otto and Yarla promise to send a letter later in the day asking for updates

item.title: The Scorched Petals
item.description:
Civil war. The kingdom was divided into two main factions: those who still supported the Queen and the Royal Family after The Condemnation, and those that did not. Hollyhock, Edelweiss and Valerian versus Anemone and Amaryllis. The civil war only ended after the Family did a public apology and gave tens of thousands of gold towards Anemone's reconstruction.
The Queen's Cinders were created during this time. The Yuan was created during this time. Guild of Mechanics was legitimized during this time.

item.title: The Condemnation
item.description:
Beginning The 5th Queen started to sweep through Anemone looking for her daughter's kidnappers. She upped taxes, restricted inter-city trade and travel, and increased the Ivory Guard presence in Anemone.Ending
After her mother's sudden passing, the 6th Queen ended The Condemnation on Anemone and officially declared her sister as dead. The 6th Queen later discovered that Emer extremists kidnapped her sister in an act of defiance against the Waterbearer, and killed her. Her sister's body was never found, and the extremists were publicly executed.

item.title: Princess Esemone is Kidnapped
item.description: While on a campaign tour around the kingdom, the princess was kidnapped somewhere in Anemone.

item.title: SESSION 10 RECAP
item.description:
night - Mar 17 (Sat) the remaining party , either invisible or in mist form, sneak on the next train that takes them out of the Mining Circle
the rest of the party make their way back to the Last Line Tavern (after quickly defeating a shadowy creature on the side of the road), and promptly all go to sleep while sleeping, Wynn is visited by her patron. through them, Wynn sees a potential future that details fissures running along the magical barrier that surrounds the kingdom. this future is seen as the best outcome after getting caught by the Ivory Guards stationed outside the western entrance of the mines, Diaspro is taken into custody by one of the guards named Thane Thane is tasked with taking her to one of the Guard bases in Anemone to be processed for trespassing on private property and forgery of an official document
after getting off the train it's quickly revealed that Thane has no idea where he's going. Diaspro takes this opportunity to take charge and lead them towards the Akkins branch of the Inventor instead
once they arrive, Diaspro has Reverend Symon send an expedited letter to her father asking for a legal aid Diaspro then refuses to be moved from this location, forcing Thane to call in the local AoP that will arrive the next morning. before going to sleep, Diaspro takes another look through the temple's small library:
she finds a book that talks about a cult that had played a role in the Scorched Petals that was stationed somewhere in the mines
while sleeping, Diaspro has a dream reliving a memory. in the dream, Diaspro embodies someone who standing before a shimmering crack floating above an alter. the dream abruptly cuts off as that someone takes the black dagger in their hands and brings it up to their chest day - Mar 18 (Sun) early in the morning the AoP arrive, but Diaspro hides from them until Margret arrives.

item.title: Russel Tally

item.description: Infobox “N/A image.png” could not be found. WIPUNKOWN TO THE PARTY Russel Tally - fellow white thal miner

item.title: SESSION 3 RECAP
item.description:
day - March 15 (Thu) Sister Erynis unconscious and the group is unable to wake her. She seems to be physically alright.
Reverend Symon is brought in and he calls for an AoP cleric Royal AoP storm the temple and arrest a man named Rus on the grounds of stealing from Osiris Corp
Reverend Symon is unable to stop the arrest and eventually turns to the part and talks about Rus the group learned this info: Rus' full name is Russel Tally Rus works in the white thal mines In recent months, Rus has started to cough more and has noticeably started to cover up more Rus has even needed family to come and help him leave the temple Reverend Symon tells the group that Rus lives on the west side of Firebox, and he gives Diaspro letters back from her father and twin brother
the group decide to head back to the Last Line tavern, and on their way out of the temple they cross paths with Maddy, an AoP cleric at the Last Line tavern, Diaspro listens in on a conversation between Xavier and a pink-skinned tiefling Diaspro receives another letter via cycrane, and Kaimop receives letters from his family the group decides to split up to gather more intel and they plan to meet at Rus' home the next day
Kaimop and Wynn travel up to northern Anemone to visit Kaimop's family
Thia and Diaspro travel to Edelweiss to meet with Diaspro's father and sister at The Exhibit Irosys travels back to his hotel

item.title: SESSION 1 RECAP
item.description:
night - March 14 (Wed), 6584 a hooded gnome walks into The Last Line Tavern and gets a key to room 204 from the bartender named Cel a redheaded half-elf and rich-looking wood elf come downstairs from their rooms the redhead buys a shot at the bar, and the wood elf takes a seat at a table a mysterious-looking half-elf is whispering to someone at a table under the stairs the tavern’s newly hired human helper takes a bottle of wine upstairs to room 204
The roomskeeper Xavier loudly summons everyone in the tavern for a game of darts everyone but Cel, the hired helper, the wood elf, and the hooded gnome play the wood elf notices a golden sphere camera floating in the corner of the tavern and alerts Cel Cel calls for Xavier to get the hired helper from upstairs to help reach the camera
Kaimop, the hired helper, knocks the camera down shadowy creatures start appearing from the shadows in the tavern 3 regulars of the tavern make their escape, but everyone else stays and kills the creatures Cel nearly dies trying to get to Xavier 3 military personnel bang on the tavern doors and enter the mysterious half-elf quickly hides behind the tavern bar and the hooded gnome magically blinks out of sight
one of the military personnel, Members, introduces herself as one of The Queen's Cinders Lt. Nuyi goes back and forth with Kaimop over who is in the tavern
Lt. Nuyi talks about similar attacks happening around Anemone for “months now”
Lt. Nuyi tries to recruit those who just fought - giving an audience with The Queenas a form of payment - but is met with resistance
the wood elf, Thia, introduces herself with just her first name Lt. Nuyi explains how to get into contact with her in case anyone changes their minds before leaving, the other 2 military personnel heal Cel and Xavier and wipe their memories the hooded gnome then reappears and reveals that the tavern is enclosed in a domain and that no one can leave for at least a few more hours

item.title: NPC_Cel Effie
Speakers of Religion and Magic
item.description:
The Speaker of Religion has historically been a cleric that follows the Waterbearer. This Speaker educates the Queen on matters relating to any of the three religions, and is known in some cases to be a voice that the Waterbearer speaks through.  The Speaker of Religion is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY
The Speaker of Magic has historically been picked from the Circuit of Arcana. This Speaker advises the Queen on all matters relating to magic. The Speaker of Magic is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY
item.guid: 2. World/2.4 Government/2.43 Speakers of Religion and Magic/Speakers of Religion and Magic.md

item.title: SESSION 9 RECAP
item.description:
night - Mar 17 (Sat) after regrouping with Diaspro, the full party discuss how to get around the Yuan and Aerosol fighting after Irosys does some reconnaissance, the party enacts a plan that distracts and obscures the vision of the sky pirates as the party sneaks past them the party fails to sneak past the pirates without being noticed, and Yuan members chase them down a narrow corridor that leads to a chasm with more members
before things could escalate into a full on fight, Disapro talks to one of the higher ranked members until Madam Dolores Lotus arrives the Madam and Diaspro have an argument and Diaspro doubles down on the lie as to why she and the rest of party are in the mines before the Yuan leave, a few things are hinted: in certain circles, there is a bounty out for people like Irosys they used an alternative means of leaving the mines, probably by air the Madam's son is the reason why they were there the party then traces back Diaspro's steps towards the end of the puzzle they were originally following
in a small cavity to the side, the party meets a white thal miner named Otto takeaways from their conversation with Otto: Thia reads his mind and relives a meeting between him, Zeke and a mysterious person during a NDA meeting
the only features Thia can pick out is that the mysterious figure has a black band on their left ring finger, an Esemone alumni pin on their expensive-looking shirt, and is holding a red crystal then the party asks Otto why he is alone, and Otto answers vaguely Irosys reveals his face and asks Otto earnestly if he's seen his dad, Otto denies ever seeing him Diaspro then offers Otto 10 gold pieces if he answers honestly, but Otto declines saying "It's not what he needs" and that "It's not enough gold anyway" Otto, in so many words, hints that one of his own is "in trouble" and needs a high-level mage for something
before the party leaves, Kaimop gives Otto the address to the Last Line Tavern and implores him to meet with them tomorrow to talk more about what he needs the party then retraces their steps until they make their way out of cave 10
minus Diaspro, the party uses potions to either turn invisible or into mist and sneak past the Ivory Guards Diaspro gets caught by said Ivory Guards, and her forged letter doesn't fool them

item.title: Black Cloak Coalition
item.description: WIP

item.title: SESSION 7 RECAP
item.description: night - March 17 (Sat) in order to sneak past the guards to the mines, the party plans to create a explosion that will distract the guards while they slip their way past the gate while sneaking around, the party notices the upped security due to the recent theft of white thal after successfully sneaking around the Ivory Guard patrolling the cave entrance, the party uses the symbol found on Rus' letter to navigate the different pathways while making their way through the mines, the party - minus Diaspro - sinks into loose gravel and fall 60ft into a large cave hub Thia is the first to notice a large spider along the roof of the hub the large spider jumps down despite Thia's attempt to make it fall asleep, and the battle begins

item.title: The Queen's Cinders
item.description: A group of five people that work directly under the Queen. The Cinders are a mix between the Navy SEALS and Secret Service, and are ranked amongst themselves. They are infamous in high-society circles for doing the Queen’s dirty work at any cost. Lieutenant Nuyi
item.guid: 2. World/2.4 Government/2.42 Queen's Cinders/The Queen's Cinders.md

item.title: Eora Timeline
item.description:
The 1st Queen's rule begins. ~ 0000 0900 ~ The 2nd Queen is born.
1200 ~ The 1st Queen dies. The 1st Queen's rule ends. ~ 1200 The 2nd Queen's rule begins. ~ 1200
1400 ~ The 3rd Queen is born.
2000 ~ The 2nd Queen dies. The 2nd Queen's rule ends. ~2000 The 3rd Queen's rule begins. ~ 2000
2000 ~ The 4th Queen is born.
2400 ~ The 3rd Queen dies. The 3rd Queen's rule ends. ~ 2400 The 4th Queen's rule begins. ~ 2400
2400 ~ The 5th Queen is born.
2800 ~ The 4th Queen dies. The 4th Queen's rule ends. ~ 2800 The 5th Queen's rule begins. ~ 2800
2800 ~ Princess Esemone is born.
3000 ~ The 6th Queen is born.
3100 ~ Princess Esemone is kidnapped.
3100 ~ The Condemnation begins
3150 ~ Clash in Akkins
3150 ~ The Neverending Storms
3200 ~ The 5th Queen dies. The 5th Queen's rule ends. ~ 3200 The 6th Queen's rule begins. ~ 3200 3200 ~ The Condemnation ends.
3200 ~ The 7th Queen is born.
3200 ~ The Scorched Petals begins. 3300 ~ The Scorched Petals ends.
3700 ~ The 8th Queen is born.
The 6th Queen dies. The 6th Queen's rule ends. ~ 4000 The 7th Queen's rule begins. ~ 4000
4100 ~ The 7th Queen dies. The 7th Queen's rule ends. ~ 4100 The 8th Queen's rule begins. ~ 4100
4300 ~ The 9th Queen is born.
4600 ~ The 8th Queen dies. The 8th Queen's rule ends. ~4600 The 9th Queen's rule begins. ~ 4600
4800 ~ The 10th Queen is born.
5200 ~ The 9th Queen dies. The 9th Queen's rule ends. ~ 5200 The 10th Queen's rule begins. ~ 5200
5200 ~ The 12th Queen is born.
5800 ~ The 10th Queen dies. The 10th Queen's rule ends. ~ 5800 The 11th Queen's rule begins. ~ 5800
5853-02-14 ~ The 12th Queen is born.
6100 ~ The 11th Queen dies. The 11th Queen's rule ends. ~ 6100 The 12th Queen's rule begins. ~ 6100
6224-08-06 ~ The 13th Queen is born.
6450-05-24 ~ Princess Penelope is born. The 12th Queen abdicates. ~ 6453-08-29 The 13th Queen's rule begins. ~ 6453-08-29
6584-03-14 ~ Campaign starts.

item.title: The 12th Queen
item.description: Infobox “N/A image.png” could not be found. WIPWIPWIP Erza Pacific - Her only daughter.

item.title: The 8th Queen
item.description:
Infobox “N/A image.png” could not be found. WIPWIP As the youngest daughter of Queen Tinna, Drusilia was seen as the spare and had more freedom than any of her other siblings. She spent many of her younger years fooling around.
After her sister's sudden passing, neither of her other siblings vied for the throne and Princess Resin was deemed too young to rule. Theren Pacific - Her oldest son. Xana Pacific - Her oldest daughter. Stella Pacific - Her youngest daughter. The confirmed legitimate child and heiress.

item.title: The 1st Queen
item.description:
Infobox “N/A image.png” could not be found. Queen Amber had a youthful appearance until her passing. It was rumored that she was blessed by the Waterbearer with a long life.WIPWIP
Lucillia - Her only daughter.

item.title: The 9th Queen
item.description: Infobox “N/A image.png” could not be found. WIPWIP Her sister contested her ruling. However with the help of her cousin, they confirmed Xana's illegitimacy and had her banished. Melaine Pacific - Her only daughter.

item.title: The 7th Queen
item.description: Infobox “N/A image.png” could not be found. WIPWIP Was the oldest Queen to begin her rule, and the Queen with the shortest rule. Resin Pacific - Her only daughter.

item.title: The 2nd Queen
item.description: Infobox “N/A image.png” could not be found. WIPWIPWIP Sabrina - Her only daughter.

item.title: The Neverending Storms
item.description: Angered by the Clash in Akkins and emboldened with the Waterbearer patronage, Queen Enna summoned devastating storms all across Anemone. Ivory Guards utilized military-grade domains to create safe zones in strategic locations across the city. In order to enter these safe zones, each citizen of Anemone was throughly checked. As none of the cities were designed to withstand such weather disasters, sections of Anemone were flooded for months afterwards. Repairs took years to complete.

item.title: Clash in Akkins
item.description: After fifty years of abuse, the people of Anemone clashed physically with the Ivory Guards stationed in Akkins, Anemone. The clash began when someone threw a molotov cocktail at an Ivory Guard. Five Ivory Guards and eighteen civilians died in the altercation.

item.title: Woodland Clan
item.description: Wood Elves are nobility based strictly on their race. Consists of two lines: Upper Branches and Lower Roots. Those of the Branches are most commonly seen with the Royal Family and others of high status/wealth.  Those of the Lower Roots are well-respected in the general public but are overshadowed within the Woodland Clan. The main family of the Branches was (rumored to be) second place when the Royal Family was originally chosen. WIP

item.title: Guild of Mechanics
item.description: Consists of many different families but is headed by the Lietbreit Family. The Guild garnered respect and prestige during the Scorched Petals. Rumors have it that the original leader of the guild was blessed by the Inventor with the gift of an innate understanding of mechanics/technology. The Guild can almost be seen as a government body but is more like a bureaucracy. The Guild has a hand in most avenues that rely heavily on mechanics (aka transportation, manufacturing/mining, research/innovation The Lietbriet Family - created hydroelectric power through turbines The Argus Family - created cameras/security systems WIP

item.title: Circuit of Arcana
item.description: An assembly of eight highly powerful magic users who have all graduated from either of the main magical institutions. These mages help regulate, legislate, and innovate magic. WIP

item.title: Tempest, the Waterbearer
item.description: In official texts, the Waterbearer is depicted as a willowy woman with dark, liquid-like hair. Her eyes and outfit defer by the artist, but typically she has either blue or black colored eyes, and wears an extravagant dress in shades of blue. The Waterbearer is often shown holding an urn or large bowl, pouring water into fields or into the Trench. Her immaterial forms include crashing/rushing water and calming/booming rain.The original symbol of the Waterbearer was of a sea shell. In modern times, her worshippers made a water droplet her official symbol. Stories of the Waterbearer write her as a benevolent being with an incredible temperament and pose. She is a being that rules above all others and is something to look up to.The Waterbearer is the deity of water, change and choice. Those that follow her are the cornerstones adapting to and creating change. They embody kindness, calmness, and the willingness to “go with the flow.” Their beliefs revolve around the ability to make their own choices and pave their own destiny.Over six thousand years ago, the Shadow Flood swept across the lands and consumed everything in its path. To protect those remaining, the 3 True Gods created the Kingdom of Eora as a haven. Vulcan the Inventor, created the kingdom's foundations using his omnipotent knowledge of technology. Tempest the Waterbearer, graced the kingdom with water, its primary resource. Emer of the Soil gave the kingdom life giving it a precious amount of soil, crops, and animals. Soon after establishing the Kingdom of Eora, the True Gods hand-picked and blessed a Dark Elven family (the Pacifics) that would become the Royal Family. The Waterbearer then chose the First Queen of Eora, and the line of succession has run through women ever since. Once the surviving populace was safe within Eora’s walls, the True Gods spent and continued to spend their time battling against the Shadow Flood. They do this with the hope that one day the survivors will be able to walk the earth freely once again. Information. UNKOWN TO THE PARTY
item.guid: 2. World/2.6 Deities/2.61 The True Gods/Tempest, the Waterbearer.md

item.title: Vulcan, the Inventor
item.description:
The earliest depictions of the Inventor show him as a whimsical young man. Wavy blond hair and mischievous gray eyes were common features across different illustrations. After the Salvation, his image was aged to be of an older man with graying blond hair and solemn gray eyes. His clothing changes often, and is largely dependent on the current trends. His immaterial forms include the clattering of tools, the hum of running machinery, and the ticking of a clock.The Inventor’s symbol is of a clock, one of humanity’s greatest inventions.Due to the earliest recorded images of him, many believe that the Inventor is the youngest of the True Gods. However, he has aged the most over the centuries, and is seen as a great educator and philosopher.The Inventor is the god of technology, creativity and innovation. His believers can typically be found amongst architects, mechanics and those with a penchant for tinkering. Many renowned inventors attribute some of their greatest inventions to visions from the Inventor. Those that follow him embody the conviction to “try, try, and try again.”Over six thousand years ago, the Shadow Flood swept across the lands and consumed everything in its path. To protect those remaining, the 3 True Gods created the Kingdom of Eora as a haven. Vulcan the Inventor, created the kingdom's foundations using his omnipotent knowledge of technology. Tempest the Waterbearer, graced the kingdom with water, its primary resource. Emer of the Soil gave the kingdom life giving it a precious amount of soil, crops, and animals. Soon after establishing the Kingdom of Eora, the True Gods hand-picked and blessed a Dark Elven family (the Pacifics) that would become the Royal Family. The Waterbearer then chose the First Queen of Eora, and the line of succession has run through women ever since. Once the surviving populace was safe within Eora’s walls, the True Gods spent and continued to spend their time battling against the Shadow Flood. They do this with the hope that one day the survivors will be able to walk the earth freely once again. Information.
One is located in Akkins, Anemone.
item.guid: 2. World/2.6 Deities/2.61 The True Gods/Vulcan, the Inventor.md

item.title: Emer of the Lost Soil
item.description: In official texts, Emer is imagined as an older woman with brown coiled hair. Her eyes are typically brown or green, but her outfit varies wildly by artist. She’s been depicted wearing farmer clothes, extravagant dresses, and commoner outfits. Her immaterial forms include rumbling earth, crunched leaves, and sounds of nature.Emer’s symbol is of a rose, although any plant imagery can be attributed to her.Historians believe her to be the oldest of the True Gods, and they read about her maturity and wisdom in solving conflicts of long past. Emer is viewed as a gentle and maternal-like figure, although in recent centuries her influence has started to become overshadowed by her fellow gods. Emer is the goddess of soil, creatures and remembrance. Her followers are often found in roles relating to preservation. Famous historians, record-keepers, and scribes are known to be devout believers. Farmers are also known to ask for her blessing over crops and animals. Over six thousand years ago, the Shadow Flood swept across the lands and consumed everything in its path. To protect those remaining, the 3 True Gods created the Kingdom of Eora as a haven. Vulcan the Inventor, created the kingdom's foundations using his omnipotent knowledge of technology. Tempest the Waterbearer, graced the kingdom with water, its primary resource. Emer of the Soil gave the kingdom life giving it a precious amount of soil, crops, and animals. Soon after establishing the Kingdom of Eora, the True Gods hand-picked and blessed a Dark Elven family (the Pacifics) that would become the Royal Family. The Waterbearer then chose the First Queen of Eora, and the line of succession has run through women ever since. Once the surviving populace was safe within Eora’s walls, the True Gods spent and continued to spend their time battling against the Shadow Flood. They do this with the hope that one day the survivors will be able to walk the earth freely once again. Information. UNKOWN TO THE PARTY
item.guid: 2. World/2.6 Deities/2.61 The True Gods/Emer of the Lost Soil.md

item.title: Zeppelin Flight Academy
item.description: Academy for those studying to pilot zeppelins, airships, and other types of air vehicles. Has special tracks to transfer to Steamhelm Academy. WIP

item.title: Yellowbrick University
item.description: About 600 students and facility. Offers degrees for judges, lawyers, teachers, and civil servants. WIP

item.title: Steamhelm Academy
item.description: Academy for those wanting to be an Ivory Guard or AoP officer. Also has tracks for technicians, scientists and engineers willing to work under the government. WIP

item.title: Silvervalley University
item.description: About 600 students and facility. Offers degrees in business, arts, and has special tracks to transfer into either magical universities. WIP

item.title: Kindlelight University
item.description: About 600 students and facility. Offers degrees in majors relating to STEM. WIP

item.title: Tulane School of Wizardry
item.description: Offers Bachelor of Magic degrees. Gives minors/Masters/Doctorates in Enchantment, Evocation, Illusion, Transmutation, and Healing. (Can make up more.) Has clubs of valor and lore. WIP
item.guid: 2. World/2.5 Education/Magical Universities/Tulane School of Wizardry.md

item.title: The Exhibit
item.description:
The building itself is surrounded by a wall similar to the wall in the picture below. Between the building and the wall, there is a covered open space where dozens of exhibits are showcased. The first floor consists of mostly pews that circle around an ornate podium. This can be seen from the picture below. The main entrance to the temple is located to the south. The three stairways leading to the second floor can be found to the north, east and west. Small doors the lead to miscellaneous rooms and offices can be found in all the ordinal directions. Underneath the stairway to the north are double doors leading to the first floor of the temple's library.
The second floor consists of multiple doors leading to more miscellaneous rooms and spaces. The double doors located to the north opens to the second floor of the temple's library. The ceiling is made entirely of colorfully tinted glass.
UNKOWN TO PARTY Reverend Barnaby Lietbriet Sister Pearla Lietbriet

item.title: a satellite temple of The Inventor
item.description: The building itself is elevated, with a small staircase leading to the front entrance. On either side of the staircase are large white columns that go from ceiling to floor. The front area consists of a lobby that showcases exhibits of older mechanisms native to Anemone. The mechanisms are mining tool and manufacturing technologies. The front area also consists of a front desk. The back section of the temple is the main area. It consists of parallel pews all facing an artsy clock on an intricately designed podium. On either side of the podium are stairs that lead to the second floor. The second floor has three doors leading to offices to the western side. The northern side has a door leading to the temple's library. The eastern side has a door leading to a small storage room. From the second floor, the entirety of the first floor can be seen. A single-story room with shelves of books lining almost every wall. In the center is a cluster of tables, and pressed against the western wall is a couch. Most books only date back a couple of centuries, and the few that don't consist of common texts. Reverend Symon Sister Eryn
item.guid: 2. World/2.3 Geography/Landmarks/a satellite temple of The Inventor.md

item.title: SESSION 8 RECAP
item.description: night - Mar 17 (Sat) the party - minus Diaspro - kill both the large and medium cave spiders. after killing the spiders, the party rushes to pick a burrow opening that could lead out of the den. while looking for a way out, Irosys peaks into a burrow opening and sees an opened spider cocoon soon after choosing an opening, the medium spider that Thia had put to sleep before the battle wakes up and chases them up a narrow crawlspace that leads out of the den once the party digs their way out, they travel up one of the mining pathways that hasn't been walked in a long time. they go through a series of tunnels before walking on a path that has lanterns hanging from above eventually the party hears sounds of metal clinking and clashing, and Irosys scouts ahead to investigate Irosys stumbles upon a scene of 2 opposing sky pirate factions (Aerosol and The Yuan) fighting and arguing. before returning to the group, Irosys overhears the The Yuan members wanting someone returned to them. after trying to catch anyone from the party as they sink and fall through loose gravel, Diaspro shouts the remaining directions down to them before continuing through the mines after following the directions, Diaspro makes it to a dead-in as the path ahead looks caved-in. investigating around, Diaspro uncovers a trap door, and uses the rope to travel deeper underground Diaspro then travels and explores an array of different tunnels before sticking to one that has a metal door in its side. making her way inside, she looks around a locker-room like space before taking a blue-lit lantern, and a black dagger that a skeleton hand was clutching closely making her way out of the room and path into the mining pathways, Diaspro follows the similar sound of metal clinking and clashing, and joins the rest of the party

item.title: Royal Agency of Protection (AoP)
item.description:
A force that protects the citizens from each other. They can be seen patrolling and monitoring public space. This force has medical, detective, and preventive and reactive divisions. The Commissioner is responsible for all movement of the AoP. Unlike the Commander of the Ivory Guards, the Commissioner rarely gives direct orders to or through the Sheriffs. The Sheriffs typically report the goings-on of AoP to the Commissioner. The Commissioner only reports to the Queen. The Commissioner is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY The Sheriffs are responsible for the Deputies and officers stationed in their respective cities. Commands from them are typically spoken through the Deputies.
The Hollyhock Sheriff is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY
The Anemone Sheriff is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY
The Edelweiss Sheriff is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY
The Amaryllis Sheriff is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY
The Valerian Sheriff is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY The Deputies are responsible for the officers stationed in their respective districts in each city. The Hollyhock Deputies are UNKOWN TO THE PARTY The Anemone Deputies:
The 4th Ward District - Deputy “Captain” Smoke The Edelweiss Deputies are UNKOWN TO THE PARTY The Amaryllis Deputies are UNKOWN TO THE PARTY The Valerian Deputies are UNKOWN TO THE PARTY The 4th Ward District - Mandy (Medic)
item.guid: 2. World/2.4 Government/2.46 Royal Agency of Protection/Royal Agency of Protection (AoP).md

item.title: Ivory Guards
item.description:
A force that protects the highly valuable. They are often seen publicly protecting the Queen, her family members, and her estate. They also protect important public buildings, and can be hired to protect nobility and the ultra wealthy. This force has divisions relating to magical and non-magical enforcer technology. The Commander is responsible for all movement of the Guards. Commands from them are typically spoken through the Captains. They only report to the Queen. The Commander is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY The Captains are responsible for the Guards stationed in their respective cities. The Hollyhock Captain is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY
The Anemone Captain is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY
The Edelweiss Captain is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY
The Amaryllis Captain is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY
The Valerian Captain is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY Errica Thane Fredrick

item.title: Council of Eora
item.description: The Council of Eora consists of seven Head Councilmen. Each Head Councilman oversees different boards that relate to their jurisdiction. Each board consists of people who play key parts in their field. The board can consist of CEOs, specialists, and influential people from each city. The current Head is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY The current Head is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY The Board consists of 5~6 people that handles taxes for the kingdom. Typically, each board member is assigned to oversee a city. The Board consists of 5~6 people that handles commerce for the kingdom. Typically, each board member is assigned to oversee a city. The current Head is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY The current Head is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY The current Head is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY The current Head is UNKOWN TO THE PARTY
item.guid: 2. World/2.4 Government/2.44 Council of Eora/Council of Eora.md

item.title: SESSION 6 RECAP
item.description: night - March 16 (Fri) the party returns to The Last Line Tavern and go to bed early day - March 17 (Sat) early the next morning, the party discuss a plan for sneaking into the mines as part of the plan, Kaimop and Wynn get mining clothes/gear while Diaspro, Thia and Irosys go to Eora’s Bank to withdraw money Diaspro withdraws enough money to cover the cost of 5 potions while out and about, each member of the party sends out letters (some thinking it might be for the last time)

item.title: SESSION 5 RECAP
item.description:
day - March 16 (Fri) Kaimop and Wynn (K&W) arrive at Mariana’s house and let themselves in Kaimop convinces Mariana to show her blackened fingertips, but Wynn is unable to discern anything about them K&W learn that Mariana’s deceased fiancé, Gabriel, use to work in the white thal mines before dying in a sudden cave collapse K&W borrow Gabriel’s lockerbox and discover the false bottom. They take a metal key with an engraved number “10” from the false bottom K&W then head towards Rus’ house before getting on a bullet train back to Anemone, Diaspro and Thia (D&T) stop at Eora’s Bank and check their bank accounts/withdraw money K&W and D&T met with each other before making their way to Rus’ house these 4 met with Rus’ wife, Ava, and promise to pay for Rus’ bond in exchange for her telling them everything she knows. Irosys arrives at Rus’ house. Ava gives the party Rus’ lockerbox and inside was: picture of current generation of white thal miners a keycard of Zerin’s a note with an unusual drawing at the end of it
the party head to the 4th Ward District AoP precinct to somehow talk to Rus the party devise a plan to get Kaimop arrested, thus giving them a reason to be at the precinct Diaspro pays Rus’ bond and asks demands he be transported to her mother Diaspro and Rus have a mental conversation, and she confirms that he is unable to reveal much (in relation to the kidnapping of Irosys’ father). However, he does plead he never stole any white thal
the party leaves the precinct and come to conclusion that they head to the Mining Circle

item.title: SESSION 4.5 RECAP
item.description:
night - March 15 (Thu) Irosys returns to his hotel, The Daydream Hotel, and waits for his father to return later in the night, Irosys snoops around his father’s hotel room and finds nothing out of the ordinary day - March 16 (Fri) Irosys wakes up and realizes his father never returned to the hotel
Irosys then receives an undated note and decides to head to the corporate office of Osiris Corp. located in northern Hollownest, Anemone Irosys sneaks into Osiris Corp. by disguising himself as a newly hired employee, and he learns the names of all the current white thal miners Irosys investigates some of the local restaurants and finds that his father never arrived at Celine’s to have lunch with Zeke Irosys then starts making his way towards Rus’ house

item.title: SESSION 2 RECAP
item.description:
night - March 14 (Wed) because everyone remaining at the tavern is unable to leave due to the military domain, everyone goes to sleep the hooded gnome wakes first and leaves the tavern - only coming back for a short moment to read a letter sent via cycrane - to travel to a satellite temple of the Inventor in Akkins
the mysterious half-elf leaves the tavern and returns back to his fancy hotel in the 4th Ward District the half-elf has a tense conversation with his father at the fancy hotel before his father leaves for work the half-elf sends a letter to his associates at the fancy hotel day - March 15 (Thu)
the hooded gnome uses her connections to speak directly to Reverend Symon and the cleric Sister Eryn at the Inventor satellite temple the hooded gnome sends a letter to her father and her twin brother Sister Eryn feels negative/dark intent surrounding the hooded gnome the hooded gnome uses the temple’s small library to search for answers
the redheaded half-elf (Wynn), Thia and Kaimop discover that they have star markings on them the owners of the tavern don’t see the star markings
the trio head to the Inventor satellite temple and meet with the hooded gnome (Diaspro) Kaimop mails his monthly letters to his family
the mysterious half-elf (Irosys) makes it the same temple and meets with everyone Diaspro catches everyone up on what she has discovered/found out about the star markings Wynn talks about the message she received while unconscious Sister Eryn senses negative/dark intent from everyone but Wynn Sister Eryn physically touches where the marking is on Irosys, but her eyes turn black and she faints

item.title: Worldbuilding
item.description:
The entire kingdom is surrounded by physical and magical walls. The physical walls between cities are thiner and shorter than the outermost walls. This allows for air and ground travel between cities without seeing anything beyond the kingdom. The outermost walls are about thirteen miles (20.9 km) in height, and the inner cities' walls are about 6 miles (9.65 km) in height. The physical walls seemingly extend infinitely underground, and attempts to find the end in the past has lead to devastating casualties. All air travel has a maximum altitude before simply being unable to work. The maximum altitude is the height of the outermost walls. The magical walls are best seen from the sky. A iridescent shimmer can be seen in certain lighting from above as it makes a seemingly dome shape across the kingdom. Magic users and philosophers have hypothesized that the day and night cycle is simulated by the magical barrier. Records show all types of weather patterns to have occurred in the past, but in recent centuries extreme weather changes have come far and few between. Due to the manner in which the kingdom was formed, there has always been a startling lack of a fertile soil. In the beginning, all fertile soil was blessed by Emer and given to the Royal Family to manage. Only this blessed soil has the capacity to grow life. In modern times, having this soil has been a sign of great wealth or an indication of close ties with the Royal Family. When The Garden was being constructed, the Family donated blessed soil to the temple. Over the centuries an enormous tree has grown from it, and has become a symbol of a potential future.
Other than the blessed soil, water is the second most regulated resource in Eora. Initially it was also given to the Royal Family to manage, but as Eora grew the Family handed the responsibility to the Head Councilman of Water and their respective boards.
All water is sourced from the Trench. The Trench is a chasm of groundwater the circles around Hollyhock. The only time the public has access ti the Trench is on Blessings of the Waterbearer. On this day (that occurs once every eight years), the Trench is opened in a feat of engineering, and the Waterbearer pours rain only into the chasm. Water is mostly used for hydroponic farming. With the list of crops being reduced to only potatoes, wheat and rice overtime. The crops that remain are only potatoes, wheat and rice. Rice is expensive, and is mostly seen in upper-class districts and cities. Wheat and potatoes are more plentiful and cheap, and are a staple in most dishes. Other produce, spices, condiments, etc. are now chemically manufactured. Meat and poultry are plentiful and are also a staple in most dishes. Drinkable water is seen as a symbol of wealth, and is expensive to purchase pure. Most people drink milk (or diluted milk), manufactured juices or alcohol. Buildings and structures dating back to the beginning of Eora were made primarily of wood. As the kingdom grew, newer constructions were built from metal and concrete. Similar to drinkable water, having pure wooden fixtures is a sign of wealth and status.

item.title: Other Forms of Education
item.description: Before and during Basics, families with money can hire private tutors for their children to get ahead. Everyone is required to attend Basics for 10 years before being able to apply to get a higher education. Most kids enroll in Basics between the ages of 5-7. Basics are free, but the quality of the education varies by city. If some children show incredible aptitude, they can be pulled from Basics early and be in internship/mentorship programs. Focuses more on hands-on jobs such as farming, animal handling, metalworking, mechanics, etc.
